metadata.title: Armored & Air | Armored Luxury Vehicles | FIFA World Cup 2026 Mexico
metadata.description: Premium armored vehicle rental for FIFA World Cup 2026 in Mexico. Executive protection, luxury fleet, and complete discretion.

hero.headline: Command Every Mile
hero.subheadline: Armored luxury vehicles for the world's most protected journeys.

footer.description: Premium armored vehicle services for FIFA World Cup 2026 in Mexico. Security, luxury, and absolute discretion.

fleet.title: Complete Vehicle Collection
fleet.description: Every vehicle in our fleet is certified to international protection standards, meticulously maintained, and available with professional security drivers. Select your level of protection.

results.noResults: No vehicles match your current filters.

cta.title: Need assistance selecting the right vehicle?
cta.description: Our security consultants can help match your protection requirements with the ideal vehicle from our fleet.

pricing.title: Transparent Excellence
pricing.description: Our rates reflect the uncompromising standards of protection and service that define every journey. Each tier includes professional drivers and 24/7 operational support.

protectionTiers.title: Protection Tiers
protectionTiers.description: Select the level of protection that matches your security requirements. All tiers include certified armored vehicles and trained drivers.

worldCupPackages.title: World Cup 2026 Packages
worldCupPackages.description: Specialized packages designed for FIFA World Cup 2026 in Mexico. Secure your fleet early for priority access.

included.title: What's Included
items: Certified armored vehicle with full documentation
Professional security-trained driver
24/7 operations center support
Comprehensive insurance coverage
GPS tracking and monitoring

additional.title: Additional Services
additional.description: Rates vary depending on security level, city, duration, and specific services required. Additional charges may apply for:
items: Multi-vehicle convoys
Extended operational hours
Inter-city transfers
Security escort coordination
Airport meet and greet services
Special event logistics

cta.subtitle: All quotes are confidential and tailored to your specific requirements
cta.title: Ready to discuss your security needs?

services.title: Security & Concierge
services.description: Beyond the vehicle, we provide comprehensive support that ensures every aspect of your journey is handled with precision and discretion. Our services are designed to integrate seamlessly with your existing security protocols.

process.title: How We Work
process.description: Our engagement process is designed for discretion and efficiency, ensuring your requirements are met with the utmost precision.

steps.title: Initial Consultation
steps.description: Confidential discussion of your security requirements, travel itinerary, and specific needs.

steps.title: Security Assessment
steps.description: Our team evaluates routes, venues, and potential considerations to recommend the optimal solution.

steps.title: Fleet Assignment
steps.description: Selection of appropriate vehicles and personnel matched to your protection profile.

steps.title: Operational Execution
steps.description: Seamless service delivery with real-time monitoring and 24/7 support throughout your engagement.

worldCup.title: Tournament-Ready Operations
worldCup.description: For FIFA World Cup 2026, we offer enhanced services specifically designed for the unique demands of the tournament, including multi-city coordination, stadium logistics, and heightened security protocols.
features: Pre-event route reconnaissance for all venues

cta.title: Discuss Your Requirements
cta.description: Every engagement is unique. Contact us to discuss how we can tailor our services to your specific security and logistics needs.

cities.title: Host Cities
cities.description: Comprehensive armored vehicle coverage across all FIFA World Cup 2026 host cities in Mexico. Local expertise, dedicated fleets, and seamless multi-city coordination.

multiCity.title: Seamless Inter-City Movement
multiCity.description: For itineraries spanning multiple host cities, we coordinate vehicle positioning, driver assignments, and logistics to ensure continuous protection throughout your journey.

features.title: Vehicle Positioning
features.description: Your selected vehicle awaits in each city, or accompanies you via secure transport between locations.

features.title: Driver Continuity
features.description: Option for consistent driver assignment across cities or local specialists in each location.

features.title: Unified Operations
features.description: Single point of contact through our operations center for all cities and requirements.

cta.title: Planning a Multi-City Itinerary?
cta.description: Our team specializes in coordinating complex schedules across all Mexican World Cup host cities.

worldCup.title: FIFA World Cup 2026
worldCup.subtitle: Mexico
worldCup.description: Move through the tournament with absolute confidence. From group stage to final whistle, our dedicated World Cup fleet ensures secure, luxurious transport across all Mexican host cities.

hostCities.title: Mexico Host Cities
hostCities.description: Complete coverage across all Mexican venues with dedicated fleets and local expertise in each city.

packages.title: Tournament Packages
packages.description: Tailored solutions for every level of World Cup engagement, from individual matches to complete tournament coverage.

features.title: Tournament Services
features.description: Specialized capabilities designed for the unique demands of a global sporting event.

items.title: Multi-City Coordination
items.description: Seamless vehicle positioning across Mexico City, Guadalajara, and Monterrey as your itinerary evolves.

items.title: Match Day Logistics
items.description: Coordinated arrival and departure timing optimized for stadium security protocols and crowd management.

items.title: Enhanced Security
items.description: Heightened protection protocols appropriate for high-profile international events.

items.title: Group Transport
items.description: Multi-vehicle convoy capability for corporate delegations, families, and security details.

items.title: VIP Access Support
items.description: Coordination with venue VIP facilities, hospitality suites, and exclusive event areas.

items.title: Flexible Scheduling
items.description: Adaptable service that adjusts to match results, schedule changes, and evolving plans.

earlyBooking.title: Secure Your Fleet Now
earlyBooking.description: With limited armored vehicle availability in Mexico during the World Cup, early reservation ensures access to our premium fleet and preferred vehicle selection.
benefits: Locked-in rates with no tournament surge

cta.title: Ready for the World Cup?
cta.description: Contact us to discuss your World Cup 2026 requirements. Our team specializes in high-profile event logistics.

contact.title: Private Request
contact.description: Every inquiry is handled with absolute discretion. Your information is protected by strict confidentiality protocols and is never shared with third parties.

urgent.title: Urgent Requirements
urgent.description: For immediate assistance or time-sensitive requests, contact our 24/7 operations center directly.

form.title: Request Details
form.specialRequirementsPlaceholder: Any specific requirements, security considerations, or questions...

questions.q: How quickly can you arrange a vehicle?
questions.a: Standard bookings require 48-72 hours notice. For urgent requirements, contact our operations center directly for same-day availability.
All vehicles are certified to international ballistic standards (VR4-VR7) by recognized testing laboratories. Documentation available upon request.

questions.q: Do you operate outside the listed cities?
questions.a: Yes, we can arrange service throughout Mexico with advance notice. Contact us for custom logistics solutions.

questions.q: Can I request a specific driver?
questions.a: For extended engagements, we match drivers to clients based on language, experience, and compatibility. Specific requests can be accommodated.

items.title: Absolute Discretion
items.description: Your privacy is our highest priority

fleetShowcase.title: Select From Our Fleet
fleetShowcase.description: Each vehicle in our collection is meticulously selected and certified to the highest protection standards.

worldCupBanner.title: FIFA World Cup 2026
worldCupBanner.description: Secure your armored fleet for the tournament of a lifetime. Limited availability across all Mexican host cities.

citySelector.title: Serving All Host Cities
citySelector.description: Comprehensive armored vehicle services across all FIFA World Cup 2026 host cities in Mexico.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Armored & Air is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our services.

informationCollected.title: Information We Collect
informationCollected.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
items: Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number)
Organization and professional details
Service requirements and travel itineraries
Payment and billing information
Communication preferences

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our armored vehicle services
Process reservations and transactions
Coordinate security and logistics operations
Communicate with you about services, updates, and promotions
Comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement robust security measures to protect your personal information, including encryption, secure servers, and strict access controls. All personnel handling sensitive data undergo thorough background checks and confidentiality training.

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing
informationSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information only in the following circumstances:
items: With your explicit consent
With service providers who assist in our operations under strict confidentiality agreements
When required by law or to protect our legal rights
In connection with a business transfer or merger

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and understand user preferences. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
items: Access and receive a copy of your personal data
Request correction of inaccurate information
Request deletion of your personal data
Object to or restrict processing of your data
Withdraw consent at any time

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us through our secure channels or at the contact information provided on our website.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Armored & Air. These Terms of Service govern your use of our armored vehicle rental services. By using our services, you agree to these terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Armored & Air services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.

services.title: Services Description
services.content: Armored & Air provides premium armored vehicle rental services with professional drivers. Our services include:
items: Certified armored vehicle rental (VR4-VR7 protection levels)
Professional security-trained drivers
24/7 operations center support
Multi-city coordination and logistics
Concierge and additional security services

reservations.title: Reservations and Payments
reservations.content: All reservations are subject to vehicle availability and confirmation. A deposit may be required to secure your booking. Payment terms and methods will be specified in your service agreement.
items: Reservations require minimum 48-72 hours advance notice
Deposit requirements vary based on service duration and vehicle selection
Full payment is due as specified in your service agreement
All prices are in USD unless otherwise specified

cancellations.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellations.content: Cancellation terms depend on timing and service type:
items: More than 7 days before service: Full refund minus processing fees
3-7 days before service: 50% refund
Less than 3 days before service: No refund
World Cup 2026 bookings may have special terms

clientResponsibilities.title: Client Responsibilities
clientResponsibilities.content: As a client, you agree to:
items: Provide accurate and complete information for service coordination
Comply with all instructions from our security personnel
Not engage in illegal activities while using our services
Treat our vehicles, equipment, and personnel with respect
Report any incidents or concerns immediately to our operations center

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: While we maintain the highest standards of protection and service, Armored & Air's liability is limited to the value of services contracted. We are not liable for circumstances beyond our reasonable control, including but not limited to natural disasters, civil unrest, or government actions.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.content: We maintain strict confidentiality regarding all client information, itineraries, and service details. Our personnel are bound by confidentiality agreements, and we do not disclose client information except as required by law.

insurance.title: Insurance
insurance.content: All our vehicles carry comprehensive insurance coverage. Additional coverage options may be available upon request. Clients are encouraged to maintain their own travel and personal insurance.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms of Service are governed by the laws of Mexico. Any disputes shall be resolved through arbitration in Mexico City, unless otherwise agreed in writing.

modifications.title: Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Changes will be effective upon posting to our website. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of modified terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through our secure channels or at the contact information provided on our website.
